fields.name: Push-up
fields.description: An upper body exercise targeting the chest, triceps, and shoulders.
fields.starting_position: Start in a plank position with arms shoulder-width apart.
fields.execution: Lower body to the ground and push back up.

fields.name: Crunch
fields.description: An abdominal exercise focusing on the upper abs.
fields.starting_position: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat.
fields.execution: Lift shoulders towards the knees.

fields.name: Chest Fly
fields.description: An isolation exercise for the chest.
fields.starting_position: Lie on a bench with dumbbells in each hand.
fields.execution: Open arms wide and bring back together.

fields.name: Row
fields.description: A back exercise targeting the lats and upper back.
fields.starting_position: Hold a barbell or dumbbell with arms extended.
fields.execution: Pull weight towards the body.

fields.name: Lat Pulldown
fields.description: An exercise that targets the lats.
fields.starting_position: Sit at a lat pulldown machine.
fields.execution: Pull the bar down to chest level.

fields.name: Calf Raise
fields.description: An exercise that targets the calves.
fields.starting_position: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
fields.execution: Raise heels off the ground.

fields.name: Leg Press
fields.description: A compound leg exercise.
fields.starting_position: Sit on a leg press machine.
fields.execution: Push the weight up with legs.

fields.name: Bicycle Crunch
fields.description: An abdominal exercise that targets the obliques.
fields.starting_position: Lie on your back with hands behind your head.
fields.execution: Bring opposite knee to opposite elbow.

fields.name: Mountain Climbers
fields.description: A full-body exercise focusing on the abs and legs.
fields.starting_position: Start in a plank position.
fields.execution: Bring one knee to chest, then alternate.

fields.name: Russian Twist
fields.description: An exercise for the obliques.
fields.starting_position: Sit with knees bent and lean back slightly.
fields.execution: Twist torso from side to side.

fields.name: Plank
fields.description: An isometric exercise for core strength.
fields.starting_position: Hold a plank position on forearms and toes.
fields.execution: Hold position for as long as possible.

fields.name: Leg Raise
fields.description: An exercise for the lower abs.
fields.starting_position: Lie on your back with legs extended.
fields.execution: Lift legs up to 90 degrees.

fields.name: Shoulder Press
fields.description: A shoulder exercise using dumbbells or a barbell.
fields.starting_position: Hold weights at shoulder height.
fields.execution: Press weights overhead.

fields.name: Bench Press
fields.description: A compound exercise for the chest.
fields.starting_position: Lie on a bench with a barbell above chest.
fields.execution: Lower bar to chest and press back up.

fields.name: Deadlift
fields.description: A compound lift targeting the back and legs.
fields.starting_position: Stand with feet hip-width, bar in front.
fields.execution: Lift bar by extending hips and knees.

fields.name: Tricep Dip
fields.description: An exercise for the triceps.
fields.starting_position: Hold onto bars with arms extended.
fields.execution: Lower body and press back up.

fields.name: Bicep Curl
fields.description: An exercise isolating the biceps.
fields.starting_position: Stand with dumbbells in each hand.
fields.execution: Curl weights up to shoulder.

fields.name: Pull-up
fields.description: A back and bicep exercise using bodyweight.
fields.starting_position: Hang from a bar with hands shoulder-width apart.
fields.execution: Pull body up to the bar.

fields.name: Lunge
fields.description: A compound leg exercise targeting the glutes and quads.
fields.starting_position: Stand with feet together.
fields.execution: Step forward and lower body into a lunge.

fields.name: Squat
fields.description: A lower body compound exercise.
fields.starting_position: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
fields.execution: Lower body by bending knees and hips.
